question: Which book recorded King Nebuchadnezzar's troubling dream?
What language was most of the Old Testament originally written in?
Which land did Abram originally leave to head to the land of Canaan?
How many days did it rain during the flood?
In the beginning, God created the _____ and the earth (Genesis 1:1)
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his _____ (Romans 8:28)
But we have this treasure in _____ to show that this all-surpassing power is from God and not from us (2 Corinthians 4:7)
Now faith is _____ in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see (Hebrews 11:1)
In 2 Corinthians 4:7, what container does Paul say we have treasure in?
In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth
God said to Moses, “I am who I am.This is what you are to say to the Israelites: ‘I am has sent me to you.’”
I am a rose of Sharon, a lily of the valleys
But we have this treasure in jars of clay to show that this all-surpassing power is from God and not from us
